title: Being Grateful For The Gift of Today | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Being Grateful For The Gift of Today | Joel Osteen
description:
The key to cultivating happiness is to stay focused on the positive in our lives. Discouragement and worry cannot take root in a grateful heart. 

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
